projects.title: Autonomous Ground Vehicle (AGV)
projects.problem: Build an AI-driven rover for autonomous navigation with computer vision, real-time obstacle avoidance, and precision mapping.
projects.description: Designed a 4WD rover with SLAM mapping, A* pathfinding, and sensor fusion. Built computer vision pipeline using TensorFlow for object detection. Achieved 0.5m precision GPS navigation and 92% accuracy in obstacle detection.

projects.title: BOMANI: Livestock Intelligence Platform
projects.problem: Help 10M+ Indian farmers identify cattle breeds at scale. Constraints: Low bandwidth, rural connectivity, affordability.
projects.description: Built computer vision system for breed identification optimized for mobile. Server-side inference on resource-constrained devices. Real-time health monitoring and pricing intelligence. Designed for offline-first operation.

projects.title: Mail-Reader Automation (NLP/ML)
projects.problem: Automate email categorization, summarization, and spam detection at scale. Process 500+ emails daily with 89% accuracy.
projects.description: Deployed supervised learning model for email classification. Implemented NLP pipeline for spam detection and priority categorization. Integrated with Gmail/Outlook APIs. Reduced manual email handling by 30%.

projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.problem: Build a scalable, secure messaging platform supporting 100+ concurrent users with <50ms latency.
projects.description: Developed end-to-end encrypted messaging with Socket.IO for real-time sync. Implemented Redis for session management and message caching. MongoDB for persistence. Achieved <50ms latency with 50MB file sharing.
